text:
István Seregély (13 March 1931 – 31 December 2018) was a Hungarian prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Archbishop of Eger from 5 June 1987 to 15 March 2007. He was born in Szombathely, Hungary.
Seregély died on 31 December 2018 in a priest social home in Nyíregyháza, Hungary at the age of 87.
